testcase.classname: Full Signup, Login, and Cleanup Flow
testcase.name: User removes a product from the cart
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the browser.............................................passed And User navigates to "http://automationexercise.com".......................passed Then Home page should be visible successfully...............................passed When User add products to cart..............................................passed And User clicks on 'Cart' button on RemoveCart page.........................passed Then Cart page should be displayed..........................................passed When User clicks 'X' button corresponding to the product....................passed Then Product should be removed from the cart................................passed
